original_text:
I have not departed from the commandment of his lips;
    I have treasured the words of his mouth more than my portion of food.
korean_text: 내가 그의 입술의 명령을 어기지 아니하고 정한 음식보다 그의 입의 말씀을 귀히 여겼도다

sentences.original_text: I have not departed from the commandment of his lips
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그의 입술의 계명을 떠나지 않았다

sentences.original_text: I have treasured the words of his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그의 입에서 나온 말씀을 귀히 여겼다

sentences.original_text: more than my portion of food
